short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the official Chrome extension to run Plurally flows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the official Chrome extension for Plurally (https://tryplurally.com).

This extension will allow you to start your Plurally flow directly from your browser. This is ideal if you want to automate run flows that will need to use the data present in the current page.

For example:
- Extract information about a profile and uploads it into a spreadsheet or database
- Extract name of a business + email address and send a cold email
- Extract data from a website and send a summary in an email report 
- And much more!

See examples at https://tryplurally.com/gallery/
